entry.value: library(flowCore)%%00010library(CytoML)%%00010library(flowWorkspace)%%00010directory <- dirname(knime.flow.in[["files"]])%%00010dir.create(paste(directory, "/CytobankFCSfiles", sep = ""))%%00010xmlfile <- knime.flow.in[["gatingML"]]%%00010fcsFiles <- list.files(dirname(knime.flow.in[["files"]]), pattern = ".fcs", full.names = TRUE)%%00010gs <- cytobank2GatingSet(xmlfile, fcsFiles)%%00010##Create directories to write out FCS files for each individual sample%%00010for (i in 1:length(G)) {%%00010 dir.create(paste(directory, "/CytobankFCSfiles/", sampleNames(G[[i]]), sep = ""))%%00010}%%00010##Not every sample may have the same gating structure, so create a list of data frames that contain all the nodes for each sample%%00010nodes <- list()%%00010for (i in 1:length(G)) {%%00010 nodes[i] <- as.data.frame(getNodes(G[[i]], path = "auto"))%%00010}%%00010##Gates files by first looping through files (outer loop) and then looping through specific nodes (inner loop)%%00010for(i in 1:length(G)) {%%00010 for (j in 1:nrow(as.data.frame(nodes[i]))) {%%00010 gated_data <- getData(G[[i]], as.character(as.data.frame(nodes[i])[j,]))%%00010 write.FCS(gated_data, paste(directory, "/CytobankFCSfiles/", sampleNames(G[[i]]), "/", as.character(as.data.frame(nodes[i])[j,]), "_", sampleNames(G[[i]]), sep = ""), what="numeric")%%00010 }%%00010}%%00010knime.out <- as.data.frame(exprs(read.FCS(paste(directory, "/CytobankFCSfiles/", sampleNames(G[[i]]), "/", as.character(as.data.frame(nodes[i])[j,]), "_", sampleNames(G[[i]]), sep = ""))))%%00010%%00010

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
